name: Two Trees
description:
The Game is a  mini Narrative puzzle game. It start will as a  narrative and later the player have to solve the puzzles and unlock to stories to the end.

In game control- Space to skip the narrative. WASD to walk Mouse to rotate while walking. press "E" to interact in the game to solve the puzzles. To start the puzzle go to the RED stone and Press" E" It will giva a Puzzle to start.
